allow: Bash(timeout 60 bash -c 'while true; do STATUS=$\(curl -s -o /dev/null -w ""%{http_code}"" ""https://www.aiaccountingdaily.com/api/debug/archive-campaign?date=2025-12-23&view=true""\); if [ ""$STATUS"" == ""200"" ]; then echo ""Endpoint ready""; break; fi; echo ""Waiting for deployment... status: $STATUS""; sleep 10; done')

Bash(timeout 120 bash -c 'while true; do RESULT=$\(curl -s ""https://api.vercel.com/v6/deployments/dpl_BojYrFXXYrek4F2fWX3uruSJnyWf"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $VERCEL_TOKEN"" 2>/dev/null | grep -o ""\\""readyState\\"":\\""[^\\""]*\\"""" | head -1\); echo ""Status: $RESULT""; if echo ""$RESULT"" | grep -q ""READY""; then echo ""Deployment ready!""; break; fi; sleep 10; done')

Bash(timeout 120 bash -c 'while true; do RESULT=$\(curl -s ""https://api.vercel.com/v6/deployments/dpl_AjQh67U3pko12LiWfFi9WDhXysN9"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $VERCEL_TOKEN"" 2>/dev/null | grep -o ""\\""readyState\\"":\\""[^\\""]*\\"""" | head -1\); echo ""Status: $RESULT""; if echo ""$RESULT"" | grep -q ""READY""; then echo ""Deployment ready!""; break; fi; if echo ""$RESULT"" | grep -q ""ERROR""; then echo ""Deployment failed!""; break; fi; sleep 10; done')
